info.title: Orders
info.description:
Through this reference you can consult and update orders. 

**Status**

Status | Meaning
--------- | ----------
order_created | Initial order status, no payment has been made
awaiting_payment | Waiting for payment, normally occurs in orders using bank slip as a payment method
authorized_payment | The payment has been authorized but not yet captured or confirmed
payment_accept | Payment of the order placed and approved, this status is used for order confirmation
separating_items | In preparation for shipping
dispatched | Order dispatched
delivered | Delivered to the customer
canceled | Order canceled

get.description:
Retrieves the order information with the corresponding order ID.

**Status**

Status | Meaning
--------- | ----------
order_created | Initial order status, no payment has been made
awaiting_payment | Waiting for payment, normally occurs in orders using bank slip as a payment method
authorized_payment | The payment has been authorized but not yet captured or confirmed
payment_accept | Payment of the order placed and approved, this status is used for order confirmation
separating_items | In preparation for shipping
dispatched | Order dispatched
delivered | Delivered to the customer
canceled | Order canceled

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: API accepts only JSON type data
